offenses.message: Operator `<` should be surrounded by a single space. (https://github.com/bbatsov/ruby-style-guide#spaces-operators)
Use empty lines between method definitions. (https://github.com/bbatsov/ruby-style-guide#empty-lines-between-methods)
Surrounding space missing in default value assignment. (https://github.com/bbatsov/ruby-style-guide#spaces-around-equals)
Use empty lines between method definitions. (https://github.com/bbatsov/ruby-style-guide#empty-lines-between-methods)
